<s> I began to despair in the local press I noticed an advert for an evening class cookery for men being the young one in the family I plucked up courage and enrolled but it was great with great apprehension that I went to the first class </s>
<s> I need n't have worried </s>
<s> There were twenty of us other chaps in much the same boat as me Nancy our tutor was cheerful down to earth and did not expect us to be cooks </s>

<s> It says if it was travelling at a constant speed of fifty miles an hour </s>
<s> It does n't sometimes it goes more slowly sometimes it goes more quickly sometimes it stops but because it takes two hours to do the hundred miles we say its average speed for the journey is fifty miles per hour </s>
<s> Its real speed changes during the journey sometimes it is more than fifty miles per hour sometimes less but in two hours it goes the same distance as it would if its speed was fifty miles per hour all the time </s>

<s> How to </s>
<s> How to make a cup of coffee </s>
<s> The first thing you have to do is take the kettle to the tap and turn the tap on and then take the kettle back from where you got it and plug it into the plug and wait for the kettle to boil </s>
<s> While you 're waiting for the kettle to boil get a cup from the cupboard and put one teaspoonful of coffee in it and then put two spoonful of sugar </s>
<s> Then after the kettle has boiled you pour the hot water into the cup and add the milk and stir it together and that 's how you make a cup of coffee </s>
<s> Well if you want you can add cake or anything </s>
<s> Have coffee and cake Yeah and coffee and biscuits </s>
<s> Okay </s>
<s> Bye </s>
<s> How to make a cup of tea </s>
<s> Well really how to make a cup of tea is like the same thing as making a cup of coffee first you have to take the kettle to the tap turn the tap on and fill up the kettle then take the kettle back to the where you got it from and plug it into the wall </s>
<s> While you 're waiting for the kettle to boil get a cup from the cupboard and a tea bag from the tea jar put tea bag in the the cup and then wait for the kettle to boil and once the kettle has boiled you put your hot water into the cup and and let the tea brew for a little while And then after you let it brew you can either add milk to it or do not add milk to it </s>
<s> And you can put as many sugars as you like to it </s>
<s> You can have biscuits and cake with it </s>
